languages.text: "И снова ты стал{mf||а} свидетел{mf|ем|ьницей} моей истины, Домин'{name}". {n}Кибелла не смотрит на вас — взгляд ее словно устремлен внутрь себя и никуда одновременно.{/n} "Свет обретен. Мы совершили еще один круг к истине, что скрывается в глубинах нашей связи".

traits.locale_text: "И снова ты стал{mf||а} свидетел{mf|ем|ьницей} моей истины, Эним'{name}". {n}Культистка не смотрит на вас — взгляд ее словно устремлен внутрь себя и никуда одновременно.{/n} "Кан'Шин исполнен. Мы совершили еще один круг к истине, что скрывается в глубинах нашей с тобой связи".

languages.text: "And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "Light has been found. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."
languages.original_text: "И снова ты стал{mf||а} свидетел{mf|ем|ьницей} моей истины, Домин'{name}". {n}Кибелла не смотрит на вас — взгляд ее словно устремлен внутрь себя и никуда одновременно.{/n} "Свет обретен. Мы совершили еще один круг к истине, что скрывается в глубинах нашей связи".

traits.locale_text: "And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Enim'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "That was Kan'shin. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

"And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Enim'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "That was Kan'shin. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

"And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Enim'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "That was Kan'shin. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

"And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Enim'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "That was Kan'shin. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

"And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "Light has been found. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

"And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "Light has been found. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

languages.text: "Und erneut habt Ihr meine Wahrheit gesehen, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah sieht dich nicht an. Ihr Blick scheint nach innen gerichtet zu sein, oder vielleicht ins Nichts.{/n} "Licht wurde gefunden. Wir haben auf unserem Weg zur Wahrheit im Herzen unserer Verbindung einen weiteren Kreis hinter uns gebracht."
languages.original_text: "And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "Light has been found. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

traits.locale_text: "Und erneut habt Ihr meine Wahrheit gesehen, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah sieht dich nicht an. Ihr Blick scheint nach innen gerichtet zu sein, oder vielleicht ins Nichts.{/n} "Licht wurde gefunden. Wir haben auf unserem Weg zur Wahrheit im Herzen unserer Verbindung einen weiteren Kreis hinter uns gebracht."

languages.text: «Y una vez más, has presenciado mi verdad, Domin'{name}». {n}Kibellah no te mira; sus ojos parecen estar centrados en su interior o, tal vez, en ninguna parte.{/n} «Has encontrado la luz. Hemos superado otro círculo en nuestro camino a la verdad, en el corazón de nuestro vínculo».
languages.original_text: "And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "Light has been found. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

traits.locale_text: «Y una vez más, has presenciado mi verdad, Domin'{name}». {n}Kibellah no te mira; sus ojos parecen estar centrados en su interior o, tal vez, en ninguna parte.{/n} «Has encontrado la luz. Hemos superado otro círculo en nuestro camino a la verdad, en el corazón de nuestro vínculo».

languages.text: 「そしてまた、あなたは私の真実を目撃したのね、ドミン・{name}」{n}キベラはあなたを見ていない…彼女の視線は内面に向いているか、もしくは何も見ていないのかもしれない。{/n}「光が見つかった。私たちは絆の中心にある真実への道程で、また新たな輪を通過した」
languages.original_text: "And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "Light has been found. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

traits.locale_text: 「そしてまた、あなたは私の真実を目撃したのね、ドミン・{name}」{n}キベラはあなたを見ていない…彼女の視線は内面に向いているか、もしくは何も見ていないのかもしれない。{/n}「光が見つかった。私たちは絆の中心にある真実への道程で、また新たな輪を通過した」

languages.text: “你再次见证了我的真实，秘者{name}。”{n}绮贝菈没有看你，她的目光似乎在审视自己的内心，也可能是在凝视虚空。{/n}“你已经找到了光明。在通往我们之间纽带核心的道路上，我们又前进了一圈。”
languages.original_text: "And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "Light has been found. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

traits.locale_text: “你再次见证了我的真实，秘者{name}。”{n}绮贝菈没有看你，她的目光似乎在审视自己的内心，也可能是在凝视虚空。{/n}“你已经找到了光明。在通往我们之间纽带核心的道路上，我们又前进了一圈。”

languages.text: « Une fois de plus, vous avez vu ma vérité, Domin'{name}. »{n}Le regard de Kibellah semble dirigé vers l'intérieur d'elle-même, ou même nulle part.{/n} « La lumière nous est apparue. Nous avons franchi un nouveau cercle sur le chemin de la vérité qui est au cœur de notre lien. »
languages.original_text: "And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "Light has been found. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois de plus, vous avez vu ma vérité, Domin'{name}. »{n}Le regard de Kibellah semble dirigé vers l'intérieur d'elle-même, ou même nulle part.{/n} « La lumière nous est apparue. Nous avons franchi un nouveau cercle sur le chemin de la vérité qui est au cœur de notre lien. »

languages.text: "Bir kez daha hakikatime tanıklık ettin Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah sana bakmıyor. Bakışları içe yönelmiş gibi görünüyor, hatta belki de hiçbir yere bakmıyor.{/n} "Işığı bulduk. Bağımızın merkezindeki hakikate giden yolda bir çemberi daha geçtik."
languages.original_text: "And once again, you have witnessed my truth, Domin'{name}." {n}Kibellah does not look at you — her gaze seems to be directed inward or, perhaps, nowhere at all.{/n} "Light has been found. We have passed another circle on our way to the truth at the heart of our bond."
